Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, and Broadway: due to, parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, Broadway and over the regular route, due to parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Grand/Division

Headline: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#73 Armitage

#50 Damen

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
